mapper.sql: id, org_no, org_name, s_year, aj_type, position, p_uid, add_date, remark, del_date, ar_no, staffname
mapper.insert:
insert into archives_info
id,
org_no,
org_name,
s_year,
aj_type,
position,
p_uid,
add_date,
remark,
del_date,
ar_no,
staffname,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{orgNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{ajType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{pUid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{addDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{delDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{arNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{staffname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update archives_info
org_no = #{orgNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
org_name = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
s_year = #{sYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
aj_type = #{ajType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
p_uid = #{pUid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
add_date = #{addDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_date = #{delDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ar_no = #{arNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
staffname = #{staffname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update archives_info set org_no = #{orgNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, org_name = #{orgName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s_year = #{sYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aj_type = #{ajType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, position = #{position,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, p_uid = #{pUid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_date = #{addDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_date = #{delDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ar_no = #{arNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, staffname = #{staffname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT AI.ID, AI.ORG_NO, AI.ORG_NAME, AI.S_YEAR, AI.AJ_TYPE, AI.POSITION, AI.P_UID, STR_TO_DATE(AI.ADD_DATE,'%Y-%m-%d') ADD_DATE, AI.STAFFNAME, AI.REMARK FROM ARCHIVES_INFO AI WHERE AI.DEL_DATE IS NULL AND AI.AR_NO = #{dpno,jdbcType=INTEGER} limit 1
